de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter

Class SparseVectorFieldFilter<V extends SparseNumberVector<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractConversionFilter<V,V>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.SparseVectorFieldFilter<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectFilter

    public class SparseVectorFieldFilter<V extends SparseNumberVector<?>>
extends AbstractConversionFilter<V,V>
    Class that turns sparse float vectors into a proper vector field, by setting the maximum dimensionality for each vector.
